participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
my favorite band is bon over.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

participant_2.background:
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast!
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
I love to make art and crafts on the weekends!
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing great! I just got done with a welding class and met a lot of new people. How about you?
I'm doing well! I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast.
That sounds fun! I love the beach. I wish I could go more often.
Me too! I love spending time in the sun and swimming.
What do you do for fun?
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week. I also love to make art and crafts on the weekends.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I like to go to the gym too, but I don't have time to make art and crafts very often.
I'm lucky that I have a lot of free time on the weekends. I also like to spend time with my fiance and son.
That's great! I'm not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
I'm sorry to hear that you're not close to your family, but it's great that you have a good relationship with your fiance.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have him in my life.
Me too! I'm lucky to have my fiance and son in my life.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! I'd love to be friends.
